name: The Patriots: Browser
description:
The Patriots: Fight and Freedom  Browser version is a free action / shooter game with a beautiful low poly graphic.

Story

The game is about a young woman named Ashley who lives with her husband and son in a small town. One day, suddenly, explosions and an alarms sounded. Military vehicles move in the city. Television reports say a group has staged a coup against the government, seized power and imprisoned the president. Ashley takes up arms and joins the resistance to save her country.

Game Features

  • Beautiful low poly style graphic
  • Strong female protagonist
  • Fun and exciting action/shooter gameplay
  • Easy to pick up and play

windows version with higher graphic:

https://hammergames.itch.io/patriots-fight-freedom
